remarks: The Yoneda embedding is a functor from the category to the category ` Q ` of presheaves on ` C ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jan-2017.)
statement:
yonval.y $e |- Y = ( Yon ` C ) $.
yonval.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
yonval.o $e |- O = ( oppCat ` C ) $.
yoncl.s $e |- S = ( SetCat ` U ) $.
yoncl.q $e |- Q = ( O FuncCat S ) $.
yoncl.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
yoncl.h $e |- ( ph -> ran ( Homf ` C ) C_ U ) $.
yoncl $p |- ( ph -> Y e. ( C Func Q ) ) $.
